pos_mean_info_list.mean: 量过的；慎重的；基于标准的；有规则的
可测量的；重要的；重大的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 较正式用词，指判断、批评事物的标准，但不一定制成了规章。
与standard基本同义，但多用于比喻，指衡量某事物的质量准则。
指公认为决定事物质量或人的品质的准则或原则。
专指测量物体大小、厚度、直径等的标准规格。

平方单位制；面积度量单位

bilingual.source: It uses its eyes to measure the position of the sun.
bilingual.target: 它用眼睛测量太阳的位置。

bilingual.source: Weather forecasting advanced over time, with more and more instruments to measure temperature, humidity and air pressure.
bilingual.target: 随着时间的推移，天气预报技术进步了，越来越多的仪器可以测量温度、湿度和气压。

bilingual.source: Measure the circumference of the circle with a tape measure.
bilingual.target: 用卷尺测量这个圆的圆周。

bilingual.source: The surveyor used an alidade to measure the angle.
bilingual.target: 测量员使用瞄准器来测量角度。

bilingual.source: Use the sizer to measure the diameter of the pipe.
bilingual.target: 使用尺寸测量器测量管子的直径。

bilingual.source: We need a surveyor to measure this piece of land.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一位测量员来测量这块土地。
我们需要测量你的身高。

bilingual.source: Use a hydrometer to measure the density of the liquid.
bilingual.target: 使用测量液体密度的仪器来测量液体的密度。

list.abstract: measure（英 [ˈmeʒə]，美 [ˈmeʒər]），英语单词，作动词用，为量；测量；度量。作名词用，为办法；措施；测量单位。短语搭配有take measures（采取措施），例句为“It criticized the measure through advertising.（它通过广告来批判这一举措。）” measure名词类近义词有extent、degree、survey等，及物动词类近义词有sound、scale、estimate，不及物动词类近义词有take stock of、weigh up。

yingyinNormal.en: One' is their unit of measure, but it's not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 「一」是测量单位，但大家都错了。

yingyinNormal.en: How exactly would one measure a sense of humor? A humormometer?
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个人要怎么衡量幽默？幽默测量器？

yingyinNormal.en: If one could measure the polarization and then not only measure it but look at its pattern, there might be kind of a swirly pattern that would be an indicator of gravitational waves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果人能够测量极化，而且不仅测量它，而且观察它的形状，可能会有一种漩涡形的形状，这会是引力波的一个指标。

yingyinNormal.en: The trick was always how were we going to measure such a thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一直棘手的问题是，我们要如何测量这样一种东西。

yingyinNormal.en: Time gives legitimacy to its existence. Time is the only true unit of measure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 时间就是存在的证明，时间才是唯一的测量单位。

yingyinNormal.en: We can predict how the universe will change with time if we measure the amounts or energy densities of the various components in the universe today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能够预测宇宙如何随着时间而发生改变，这需要我们对目前组成宇宙的各要素的数量及其能量密度进行测量。

yingyinNormal.en: She and her colleagues gently extract you from the surrounding sediment, measure and photograph all the bits and pieces they find, and begin the complex task of reconstructing how and when you lived based on the evidence they find in your bones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她和她的同事们小心翼翼地把你从周围沉积物中取出，测量、拍照对他们发现的一点一滴，然后基于他们在你骨骼中发现的证据开始复杂的工作，重现你如何以及何时生活过。

yingyinNormal.en: You know Whiplash by heart? Yes sir, every measure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你背过Whiplash的谱子了？背过了，每个拍子都记得。

yingyinNormal.en: It is precious to you beyond measure, I understand that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你眼中是无价之宝我，能够理解。

yingyinNormal.en: As a worse case measure, right? How about a best case? What if the world was safe?
yingyinNormal.zh: 是为了应对情况变坏，对吗？那最好的情况呢？如果世界安全了呢？

yingyinNormal.en: London will always be a city that looks towards the past and the future in equal measure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于过去和将来，伦敦这座城市同样重视。

yingyinNormal.en: There's no possible way to answer that. A car length is not a standardized unit of measure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有可能能回答这个问题，"车身长"不是个标准化的度量单位。

yingyinNormal.en: If you think about it, civilization has always depended on a measure of elective ignorance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 仔细想想，文明向来依靠某种程度上的选择性无知。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, do you guys have that tape measure? Oh yeah, it's actually in my bedroom. That's right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们有量尺吗？ 有，在我房里。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Scariness is the true measure of a monster. If you're not scary what kind of a monster are you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 惊吓是怪兽的本性，如果你吓不了人，算哪门子怪兽？

yingyinNormal.en: Move the anti-filibuster measure forward so the Senate can vote and elect me vice president. No. No?
yingyinNormal.zh: 推进抗阻挠措施，好让参议院能投票选我担任副总统。不行。不行？

yingyinNormal.en: Unfortunately, even if you can make it through every other security measure you won't beat the last one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不巧地是，即使你可以骗过其他安全检查，你骗不了最后一关。

yingyinNormal.en: First, I need a tape measure. And a pencil. That is where I'm going to put the nail. Don't break the wall, Daddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我需要一把卷尺，和一支铅笔。不要把墙弄坏了，爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: First, I need a tape measure. And a pencil. That is where I'm going to put the nail. Don't break the wall, Daddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我需要一把卷尺，和一支铅笔。不要把墙弄坏了，爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: But if humans are not the unit of measure, and the world isn't governed by mathematical laws, what governs all that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但假如人类没有那么独特，世界也不是靠数学法则来主宰，那什么才是？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 方法; 措施; 议案
判断; 衡量; 标准

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 测量；估量；（measure的现在分词）
n. 测量；数量；测量单位；度量制；尺寸
adj. 可测量的；可计量的；明确的；可测出的；明白可见的
adj. 慢而稳的；有节奏的；有分寸的；慎重的

word_family.mean: v. 量；测量；度量；斟酌；权衡；走过；衡量；评估；比较；达到

sense_info_list.en: a plan or course of action taken to achieve a particular purpose
sense_info_list.zh: 方法; 措施; 议案

examination_example.sentence: This should form part of a wider package of <highlight>measures</highlight> to address the long-running problems on Britain's railways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这应该成为解决英国铁路长期问题的更广泛一揽子措施的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: Some relatively poor European countries have seen huge improvements across <highlight>measures</highlight> including civil society, income equality and the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些相对贫穷的欧洲国家在公民社会、收入平等和环境等方面的措施上取得了巨大进步。

examination_example.sentence: Such <highlight>measures</highlight> have a couple of uplifting motives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些措施有几个令人振奋的动机。

sense_info_list.en: estimate or assess the extent, quality, value, or effect of something
sense_info_list.zh: 判断; 衡量; 标准

examination_example.sentence: By most <highlight>measures</highlight>, corporate governance has become a lot tighter and more rigorous since the 1970s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以大多数标准衡量，自20世纪70年代以来，公司治理变得更加严格。

examination_example.sentence: GDP as the <highlight>measure</highlight> of success is widely defied in the UK.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国内生产总值作为衡量成功的标准，在英国受到广泛质疑。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>measures</highlight> things that do not matter and misses things that do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它衡量无关紧要的事，却忽略了重要的事情。

sense_info_list.en: ascertain the size, amount, or degree of something

examination_example.sentence: They compared U.S. cities average happiness <highlight>measured</highlight> by Gallup polling with the investment activity of publicly traded firms in those areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们将由盖洛普民意测试调查得出的美国城市平均幸福指数与那些地区上市公司的投资活动进行了比较。

examination_example.sentence: It must take responsibility for the signal it sends women about the social tape-<highlight>measure</highlight> they must use to determine their individual worth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于女性该用什么样的社会标尺来确定自己的个人价值这一问题，它（时尚产业）必须为其向女性所传达的信号负责。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers <highlight>measured</highlight> people's cortisol while they were at work and while they were at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员测量了人们在工作和在家中时的皮质醇。

examination_example.sentence: Middle-aged people with higher <highlight>measures</highlight> of abdominal fat scored worse on <highlight>measures</highlight> of fluid intelligence as the years went by.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，腹部脂肪含量较高的中年人在流体智力指标中的得分更差。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 采取措施；采取步骤；采取方法

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 测量；数量；测量单位；度量制；尺寸
adj. 可测量的；可计量的；明确的；可测出的；明白可见的

word_family.mean: v. 量；测量；度量；斟酌；权衡；走过；衡量；评估；比较；达到

sense_info_list.en: estimate or assess the extent, quality, value, or effect of something

examination_example.sentence: All these effects held true for <highlight>measures</highlight> of happiness, life satisfaction and self-esteem, with the effects stronger in the 8th and 10th-graders.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有这些影响对于衡量幸福感，生活满意度和自尊心都适用，在8年级和10年级的学生中更强。

examination_example.sentence: Scores in various wellbeing <highlight>measures</highlight> began to go downward among young Americans in recent years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，美国年轻人的各种幸福感衡量标准的分数开始下降。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>measure</highlight> the effects of Internet-based distractions during class, researchers evaluated 500 students taking an introductory psychology class at Michigan State University.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了衡量上课时网络干扰的影响，研究人员对密歇根州立大学 (Michigan State University) 上入门心理学课的500名学生进行了评估。

examination_example.sentence: According to this <highlight>measure</highlight>, as of the early-to-mid-2000s, the U.S. had the highest economic welfare of any large country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这一衡量标准，在2000年代早期到中期，美国是所有大国中经济福利最高的国家。

examination_example.sentence: The Jones-Klenow <highlight>measure</highlight> can also assess an economy's performance over time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 琼斯-克莱诺指标也可以评估一个经济体在一段时间内的表现。

examination_example.sentence: We came across a recently published article by Charles Jones and Peter Knowles, which proposes an interesting new <highlight>measure</highlight> of economic welfare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们读到了 Charles Jones 和 Peter Knowles 最近发表的一篇文章，文中提出了一种有趣的新的经济福利衡量方法。

sense_info_list.en: a plan or course of action taken to achieve a particular purpose

examination_example.sentence: In your essay, you are to comment on the phenomenon described in the passage and suggest <highlight>measures</highlight> to address the issue.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你的文章中，你要对文中描述的现象进行评论，并提出解决问题的措施。

examination_example.sentence: Take <highlight>measures</highlight> to lower the cost of food products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 采取措施降低食品成本。

examination_example.sentence: The retail giant said the poor financial performance this year has pushed it to begin implementing $400 million in cost-cutting <highlight>measures</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这家零售业巨头表示，今年糟糕的财务表现促使其开始实施4亿美元的成本削减措施。

sense_info_list.en: ascertain the size, amount, or degree of something

examination_example.sentence: This was found across <highlight>measures</highlight> like self-esteem, life satisfaction, happiness and satisfaction with individual domains like job, neighborhood, or friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是在自尊、生活满意度、幸福感以及对工作、邻居或朋友等个人领域的满意度等方面发现的。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers used ACT scores as a <highlight>measure</highlight> of intellectual aptitude.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员使用ACT分数来测量智力水平。

examination_example.sentence: Even if precisely <highlight>measured</highlight>, income data exclude important determinants of economic well-being, such as the hours of work needed to earn that income.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使经过精确计量，收入数据也不包括经济福利这种重要的决定因素，例如赚取该收入所需的工作时间。

sense_info_list.en: a standard unit used to express the size, amount, or degree of something

examination_example.sentence: The background to this is that from the 1960s into the early 2000s, <highlight>measures</highlight> of average wellbeing went up in the US.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种情况的背景是，从1960年代到2000年代初，美国人的平均幸福指数一直都在提升。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"一般状态, 行为", (可转化为动词)
构成抽象名词, 表示行为的结果, 状态, 情况

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 较正式用词, 指判断、批评事物的标准, 但不一定制成了规章。
专指测量物体大小、厚度、直径等的标准规格。
measure 与 standard 基本同义, 但多用于比喻, 指衡量某事物的质量准则。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 测量；数量；测量单位；度量制；尺寸
adj. 可测量的；可计量的；明确的；可测出的；明白可见的
vt. 测量；估量；（measure的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 量；测量；度量；斟酌；权衡；走过；衡量；评估；比较；达到

sense_info_list.en: estimate or assess the extent; quality; value; or effect of something

examination_example.sentence: That allows researchers to <highlight>measure</highlight> only the effects of being chosen or not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使得研究人员可以只衡量被选中与否的影响。

examination_example.sentence: These included how many papers they authored and how influential those papers were, as <highlight>measured</highlight> by the number of subsequent citations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些包括他们写了多少论文，这些论文的影响力有多大，及后来被引用的次数。

examination_example.sentence: But San Jose also performs poorly on some of the <highlight>measures</highlight> correlated with good mobility.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但圣何塞在一些与良好流动性相关的指标上也表现不佳。

sense_info_list.en: a plan or course of action taken to achieve a particular purpose

examination_example.sentence: Philadelphia's new <highlight>measure</highlight> was approved by a 13 to 4 city council vote. It sets a new bar for similar initiatives across the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 费城的新措施在市议会投票中以13比4获得批准。它为全国各地的类似法案设立了新的门槛。

examination_example.sentence: Similar <highlight>measures</highlight> in California's Albany, Oakland, San Francisco and Colorado's Boulder are becoming hot-button issues. Health advocacy groups have hinted that even more might be coming.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在加利福尼亚州的奥尔巴尼、奥克兰、旧金山和科罗拉多州的博尔德，类似的措施正成为热点问题。健康倡导组织暗示，未来可能会出现更多类似措施。

examination_example.sentence: The ads criticized the <highlight>measure</highlight>, characterizing it as a "grocery tax".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 广告批评了这项措施，称其为“杂货税”。

examination_example.sentence: While the city council vote was met with applause inside the council room, opponents to the <highlight>measure</highlight>, including soda lobbyists, made sharp criticisms and a promise to challenge the tax in court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管市政府投票在议事厅获得了赞扬支持，但包括汽水游说者在内的反对者对这项措施提出了尖锐的批评，并承诺将在法院质疑这项征税。

sense_info_list.en: ascertain the size; amount; or degree of something

examination_example.sentence: The monstrous pearl <highlight>measured</highlight> at one foot wide and 2.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这颗巨大的珍珠宽1英尺，宽2英尺。

examination_example.sentence: Five minutes after that, we placed either bacon or bread on the surface for 5, 30 or 60 seconds, and then <highlight>measured</highlight> the number of bacteria transferred to the food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 五分钟后，我们将培根或面包放在表面上5秒、30秒或60秒，然后测量转移到食物上的细菌数量。

examination_example.sentence: Under the law in Massachusetts, tobacco companies have to <highlight>measure</highlight> the nicotine content of every type of cigarette and report the results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据马萨诸塞州的法律，烟草公司必须测量每种香烟的尼古丁含量，并报告结果。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"一般状态, 行为", (可转化为动词)
构成抽象名词, 表示行为的结果, 状态, 情况

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 测量；数量；测量单位；度量制；尺寸
adj. 可测量的；可计量的；明确的；可测出的；明白可见的

word_family.mean: v. 量；测量；度量；斟酌；权衡；走过；衡量；评估；比较；达到

sense_info_list.en: estimate or assess the extent, quality, value, or effect of something

examination_example.sentence: It can be <highlight>measured</highlight> by an IQ test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可以通过智商测试来衡量。

examination_example.sentence: The qualities of time vary with how you <highlight>measure</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时间的质量因你如何衡量它而异。

examination_example.sentence: Many people now misunderstand emotional intelligence as almost everything desitrble in a person's makeup that cannot be <highlight>measured</highlight> by an IQ test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人现在误解了情商，认为情商几乎是一个人性格中所有令人向往的品质，而这些品质不能用智商测试来衡量。

sense_info_list.en: ascertain the size, amount, or degree of something

examination_example.sentence: Radio tags (标签) on the animals will <highlight>measure</highlight> temperature changes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物身上的无线电标签将测量温度变化。

examination_example.sentence: This smart keyboard precisely <highlight>measures</highlight> the cadence (节奏) with which one types and the pressure fingers apply to each key.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这款智能键盘能精确测量用户键入的节奏，以及手指在每个键上的按压。

examination_example.sentence: G. Tononi's team <highlight>measured</highlight> the size of these connections, or synapses, in the brains of 12 mice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 托诺尼的团队测量了12只老鼠大脑中这些连接或突触的大小。

n. 文化；文明；培养；修养；培养物；态度和行为；栽培
n. 出发；启程；离开；背离；横距；东西距

exam_freq_info.chinese: (measure up to)符合(标准); 达到

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 达到标准；满足（期望等）；符合

examination_example.sentence: The government should take strict <highlight>measures</highlight> to carry out garbage sorting policy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府应采取严格措施执行垃圾分类政策。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>measures</highlight> removed people's fear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些措施消除了人们的恐惧。

examination_example.sentence: Which one did Wood agree about China’s anti-epidemic <highlight>measures</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于中国的防疫措施，伍德同意了哪一条？

sense_info_list.en: ascertain the size, amount, or degree of something

examination_example.sentence: In 1749, for example, thermometers were tied to kites to <highlight>measure</highlight> temperatures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，1749年，温度计被系在风筝上测量温度。

examination_example.sentence: They also <highlight>measure</highlight> waves from crest to crest to determine (测定) the length of a wave.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们还从波峰到波峰测量波浪，以确定波浪的长度。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>measured</highlight> (测量) his feet with a ruler and then wrote down his size on a piece of paper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他用尺子量了量脚，然后在一张纸上写下了他的尺寸。

sense_info_list.zh: (measure up to)符合(标准); 达到

examination_example.sentence: How do these electric cars <highlight>measure</highlight> up to (符合标准) traditional gasoline cars?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些电动汽车如何达到传统汽油汽车的标准？
